settings.heading: Immerse yourself in the world of art

custom_css: .service {display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 5px; transition: transform 0.3s ease; min-width: 20%; width: 100%; background: #f0a000; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);}
.container {display: flex; flex-direction: row; width: 100%; height: 300px; padding: 0 10px; column-gap: 20px;}

settings.custom_liquid:
Order an Empty Custom Frame

Tailor your framing experience to perfection. Choose from a variety of styles, sizes, and materials to complement your artwork or photograph.

Loading Your Own Product for Manufacturing

Have a specific design in mind? Bring it to life by entrusting us with your custom product manufacturing. From concept to creation, we ensure precision and quality every step of the way.

Order a Ready-Made Product

Short on time? Discover our selection of ready-made frames and prints, curated to suit various tastes and preferences. Simply pick your favorite and let us handle the rest.

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

custom_css: #previewImage {max-width: 40%; height: 40%; border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; padding: 5px; margin-top: 10px;}
#clearButton {display: none; margin-top: 10px; padding: 10px; background-color: #f44336; color: white; cursor: pointer;}
